body:
Hi All,

I just wanted to see, if anyone out there has some good estimates for
material characteristics of a freshly dressed ice surface as might be
found in a hockey rink?

Thanks,

-Jack de Valpine

--
# Jack de Valpine
# president
#
# visarc incorporated
# http://www.visarc.com
#
# channeling technology for superior design and construction
subject: [Radiance-general] material description for ice in hockey rink
